title: The Tell-tale heart
brief_description: Adaption of the Edgar Allan Poe tale of a manservant (Alex Cord), quite mad but telling the story to convince us of his rationality, who feels compelled to murder his bedridden master (Sam Jaffee), driven by obsession with the old man’s blind eye. Suitable for upper secondary level.
